info.title: Ubiqod by Skiply
info.description: Ubiqod provides a simple and powerfull platform to connect your Skiply connected buttons or QR Codes to third party platforms. This connector will trigger a flow each time data is sent by a device belonging to the configured group.

delete.description: Delete the routing of data to the trigger.

parameters.name: routingId
parameters.description: The routingId is the unique identifier of the routing in the DB.

parameters.name: Content-Type
parameters.description: The Content-Type specifies that the data is sent in json format.

device_name.description: Device Name as defined in the Ubiqod platform. This name is also visible on the device itself.
device_name.title: Device Name

device_label.description: Device Label as defined in the Ubiqod platform. Can be a place or anything helping to identify the device.
device_label.title: Device Label

request_date.description: Date of the request from Ubiqod server.
request_date.title: Request Date

button_label.description: Label of the action. Can be the label of a button, or the label of a code, if code mode is activated.
button_label.title: Action Label

times_button_pressed.description: For non-code mode, indicates the number of times that the same button has been pressed.
times_button_pressed.title: Times Button Pressed

site_id.description: Ubiqod ID of the site associated with the device.
site_id.title: Site Id

site_label.description: Ubiqod label of the site associated with the device.
site_label.title: Site Label

badge.description: Will be 1 if badge was used, 0 if not.
badge.title: Badge

post.summary: When data is received from devices
post.description: This operation triggers when one of the devices in the target group sends data.

parameters.name: provider
parameters.description: This parameter is used by Ubiqod to determine the origin of the request.

parameters.name: Content-Type
parameters.description: The Content-Type specifies that the data is sent on json format.

group_id.description: Name of the Ubiqod group you want to link to this trigger.
group_id.title: Group Name

hookUrl.description: URL of the webhook where we will post data.
hookUrl.title: Webhook URL

id.description: ID of the group in the Ubiqod account.
id.title: Group ID

group_name.description: Name of the group in the Ubiqod account.
group_name.title: Group Name
